content: using 2 contrasting shades of red heart all in one flower power this crochet blanket brightens up a room with a garden of color simply make squares and join them together as you go using lacy stitches lacework is also used to form the delicate edging to complete your filigree fabric adorned with a field of flowers both comforting and beautiful this throw is right at home in the bedroom family room and more materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m main color mc soft white 0316 2 balls or 630 yds/570 m red heart® all in one™ flower™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m contrast a cherry blossom 2000 4 balls or 41 squares contrast b forget me not 2012 4 balls or 40 squares note 1 ball will make 12 squares gauges 12 single_crochet and 15 row = 4 10 cm motif = approx 6 15 cm square measurement approx 60 152 5 cm square
